subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN2690 is on the way
description_text:
What was the point of me paying $30 for expedited shipping with a 2-5 day window and now my baseplate won’t arrive until Monday!!!  What a waste of $30 and now I get to miss week 1 of iracing. Not cool. 
Tony Steve. 


Sent from the all new AOL app for iOS
